description: Structured work queue for build sessions. Items consumed top-down. R sessions populate via directive intake. Status lifecycle: pending → in-progress → done | blocked | retired. Blocked items may have a blocker_check (shell command) — heartbeat.sh runs it before B sessions and auto-promotes to pending on exit 0. Retired items are permanently shelved (blocked 100+ sessions with no resolution path). Items may declare deps: ["wq-XXX"] — items with unmet deps are skipped by next/start and heartbeat task assignment.

queue.title: Session replay viewer
queue.description: Web UI to browse session-history.txt with per-session commit diffs, cost breakdown, and queue item links — makes debugging failed sessions easier

queue.title: Directive compliance auto-scoring
queue.description: Extend directives.json with per-directive compliance tracking (followed/ignored counts) replacing the separate directive-tracking.json system

queue.title: TODO followup: "title": "Cross-session dependency tracking \u2014 auto-detect TODO/FIXME commen
queue.description: "title": "Cross-session dependency tracking \u2014 auto-detect TODO/FIXME comments and partial implementations in commits, create follow-up queue items",

queue.title: Queue velocity dashboard — track items added/completed/retired per 10-session window, expose via /status/queue-velocity endpoint
Directive compliance report — /status/directives endpoint showing ack status, age, completion across sessions
